alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Natchitoches; Red River; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 9:35AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Red River, north central Natchitoches, southeastern Bienville and northwestern Winn Parishes through 1015 AM CDT... At 934 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Coushatta, or 25 miles north of Natchitoches, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martin, Goldonna, Saline, Ashland and Chestnut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana.
